label: YRL220
description: Yale Real Living Touchscreen Lever Lock

1.label: Alarm Reports
1.description: Alarm reports are sent out to all devices in the association group

paramInformation.label: Audio Volume
paramInformation.description: Sets the volume level of the beeps and voice prompts

paramInformation.label: Auto Re-lock
paramInformation.description: When enabled, the unit will automatically re-lock

paramInformation.label: Re-lock Time
paramInformation.description: Time after unlocking that the device will lock

paramInformation.label: Wrong Code Entry Limit
paramInformation.description: The number of invalid tries before the lock shutdowns and sends an alarm

paramInformation.label: Language
paramInformation.description: Language used by the voice prompts

paramInformation.label: Shutdown Time
paramInformation.description: Number of times the device is locked out after the invalid retries are exceeded

paramInformation.label: Operating Mode
paramInformation.description: Sets if the unit operates normal, or disables keypad and Z-Wave lock/unlock
